name: ui.stellar.expert
author: StellarExpertTeam<info@stellar.expert>
description: Block explorer with analytics platform for Stellar Network that features granular historical statistics, detailed assets dashboard, and advanced payment locator.

scripts.build-api-docs: pnpm dlx redoc-cli build open-api/openapi.yml -t open-api/openapi-template.hbs -o public/openapi.html --options.disableSearch --options.hideDownloadButton --options.hideLoading --options.expandSingleSchemaField --options.onlyRequiredInSamples --options.theme.colors.primary.main=#0691B7 --options.theme.typography.fontFamily=ClearSans --options.theme.typography.headings.fontFamily=RobotoCondensed --options.theme.typography.code.fontFamily="Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', Menlo, Courier, monospace" --options.theme.typography.headings.fontWeight=300 --options.theme.typography.fontWeightRegular=300 --options.theme.typography.fontSize=16px --options.theme.logo.maxHeight=60px --options.theme.logo.gutter=8px --options.theme.spacing.sectionVertical=24px --options.theme.typography.headings.lineHeight=1.3em --options.theme.typography.menu.level1Items.textTransform=uppercase
